items.sentence: Tom told me that he came all the way from Boston just to visit Mary.
Tom wanted to help, but Mary told him that she didn't need his help.
We have to consider the possibility Tom was involved in the robbery.
Tom certainly made it clear he didn't want Mary to attend the party.
The kid has a blue pencil in one hand, and a green one in the other.
We used to be able to swim in this river, but now it's too polluted.
Tom went to a tattoo parlor, thinking he might want to get a tattoo.
Tom got scared when he noticed a strange-looking man looking at him.
How much time do you spend every day sitting in front of a computer?
If you open that door, you might not be able to get it closed again.
